Post-Match Reflections: We were in every one of those games
That’s something we can feel good about going into the offseason.
Miscellaneous Highlights: After 10 days, 2,708 total pitches, four wins and two suspensions, the Rays’ grueling road trip against three straight division leaders is complete.
It marked the first time in MLB history that a team faced off against three straight division leaders on a road trip in September.
Others: The loss closed out a 4-6 road trip that was highlighted by a series win over the Orioles last week and a series split against the Guardians this weekend, with a sweep at the hands of the Phillies in between.
